item.title: Direct connection towards Busto
item.description: Dear Customer, As from September 2013, Hupac will organise 4x per week a roundtrip between Combinant and Busto. Please find below the flyer.

item.title: HOYER takes stake in Combinant
item.description: HOYER takes stake in Antwerp’s Combinant terminal Hamburg logistics business expands its European intermodal network Hamburg – August 7th, 2013– Internationally active logistics provider HOYER, with its headquarter in Hamburg, is continuing to build up its intermodal activities in terminals. As part of this drive, HOYER has acquired an interest in the Antwerp Combinant terminal held by Belgium’s Inter Ferry Boats (IFB). This acquisition reinforces the Hamburg company’s already existing presence in one of Europe’s most important transport hubs for the chemicals industry.

item.title: New train connection Antwerp - Dourges
item.description: As from March 7th, Naviland started up a new service from Antwerp towards Dourges with direct connections within France. Naviland flyer View more presentations from Combinant.
